<!-- Mark relevant options with [x] -->

- [ ] 🎨 Style/UI update (non-functional changes)
- [ ] ⚡ Performance improvement
- [ ] ♻️  Code refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] 🧪 Test addition or update
